email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a vessel, MV Ocean Star, available for loading around October 20-25. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Would you be able to come down to $49.75 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owner, and we can adjust the freight rate to $50.00 per ton, which is our best offer. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $50.00 per ton, provided the laycan remains October 20-25. Please confirm the vessel details and send over the recap for review. Also, could you clarify the laytime calculation? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re aligned. Attached is the recap for your review. The laytime is calculated as 72 hours SHINC (Sundays and Holidays Included). The vessel, MV Ocean Star, is confirmed for loading at Ras Tanura and discharging at Rotterdam. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Recap
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the recap looks good. We’ll proceed with the fixture. Please confirm the laycan and demurrage terms one last time, and we’ll finalize the paperwork. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed: laycan October 20-25, freight rate $50.00 per ton, demurrage $25,000 per day pro-rata. I’ll send over the final contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
